definition: pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)

sentences.english: PACAP, Rat pituitary adenylate cyclase activating polypeptide.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠垂體腺苷酸環化酶激活肽。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis of subacute pituitary apoplexy and evaluate the surgical results.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討亞急性垂體卒中的診斷及評價手術治療效果。

sentences.english: The significance of pathogenesis of Growth-hormone secreting pituitary adenomas.
sentences.chinese: 深入探討垂體生長激素腺瘤發病機制的重要性。

sentences.english: Do excision , VP contents change a hypophysis?
The results suggested that Nujin Pill could regulate the function of pituitarium-ovary axis.
sentences.chinese: 提示女金丹對垂體卵巢軸具有興奮和調整作用。

sentences.english: The hypothalamus controls hormone secretions from the nearby pituitary gland.
sentences.chinese: 下丘腦控制附近腦下垂體分泌激素。

sentences.english: The unmyelinated nerve fibers either terminate around the blood capillaries or approach near pituicytes.
sentences.chinese: 無髓神經纖維終止於毛細血管周圍或僅貼垂體細胞。

sentences.english: All the tumors were removed by the single-nostril transsphenoidal microsurgery.
sentences.chinese: 均行單鼻腔經蝶入路顯微切除垂體腺瘤。

sentences.english: According to these examinations, can know the volume that whether has hypophysis tumour and tumour system.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些檢查，可瞭解是否有垂體瘤及瘤體的大小。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method of treating hypophysial dwarf by transplantation of embryonic anterior pituitary cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索人胚腺垂體移植治療垂體性侏儒症的新途徑。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method of treating hypophysial dwarf by transplantation of embryonic anterior pituitary cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索人胚腺垂體移植治療垂體性侏儒症的新途徑。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnostic accuracy of non pituitary lesions in sphenoidal sinus and sellar area.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高蝶竇鞍區非垂體源性佔位性病變的診斷水平。

sentences.english: Transsphenoidal microsurgical removal of 104cases of GH-secreting adenoma are reported.
sentences.chinese: 報告104例經蝶竇顯微外科切除垂體生長激素腺瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the expression of pituitary tumor transforming gene (PTTG) in pituitary macroadenomas and its relationships with tumor invasiveness.
sentences.chinese: 在垂體大腺瘤中的表達，探討其與腫瘤侵襲性的關係。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Iodine excess on TSH cells in postnatal Wistar rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討碘過量對仔鼠垂體TSH細胞的影響。

sentences.english: The patients following transsphenoidal surgery of pituitary adenoma may develop disturbances in water and electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 垂體瘤經蝶手術後可發生水和電解質失調。
